title: Premium to be paid for additional FSI shall be 15% of the land rates for the said land as prescribed in Annual Statement of Rates, without applying guidlines
clause_text: Premium to be paid for additional FSI shall be 15% of the land rates for the said land as prescribed in Annual Statement of Rates, without applying guidlines. Sharing of premium between the Planning Authority and the Government shall be 75 : 25.
section: (1) 7.8.2 For areas except areas mentioned in Regulation No.7.8.1 above and expect Regional Plan areas

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Premium to be paid for additional FSI shall be 15% of the land rates for the said land as prescribed in Annual Statement of Rates, without applying guidlines.
